data.title: What channel is Ring of Fire? Live stream info, start time, how to watch
data.meta_description: Tyson Fury and Oleksandr Usyk finally settle their rivalry in the hugely anticipated undisputed world heavyweight title clash on Saturday, February 17...
data.text:
Tyson Fury and Oleksandr Usyk finally settle their rivalry in the hugely anticipated undisputed world heavyweight title clash on Saturday, February 17.

The heavyweight pair come together to put all the belts, and their undefeated records, on the line as they shoot for greatness.

The winner will hold the achievement of being the very first undisputed heavyweight in the four-belt era, and one of the finest boxers of the modern age.

The fight will be shown around the world live on DAZN - see below for full details.

Here's all you need to know ahead of Ring of Fire.

Live on DAZN: Super Bowl LVIII on February 11 (exc. US and China). Click here for details.

Fury vs. Usyk date, start time

Date: Saturday, February 17

Start time: TBC

Main event ringwalks (approx): TBC

How to watch Fury vs. Usyk

Fans worldwide can watch the fight live on DAZN excl. China, Russia, Belarus & Ukraine.

To buy, visit DAZN.com

What devices are supported by DAZN?

DAZN has apps available for all of the following platforms: Apple TV, Chromecast, Amazon Fire TV, Amazon Fire Stick, Amazon Fire Tablet, Android Phone & Tablet, iPhone & iPad, Android TV, LG, Smart TV, Panasonic Smart TV, Samsung Smart TV, Sony Smart TV, SmartCast, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5 and Roku.

Here is a full list of the devices where DAZN is available, in addition to web browsers on DAZN.com (if you are in Argentina, Chile and Colombia you must download the DAZN app from the Apple App Store or Android Google Play store and then sign up from there, rather than via web browser):

Where is Fury vs. Usyk being held?

The fight will take place at the Kingdom Arena in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

Tyson Fury record and bio

Nationality: British

Date of birth: August 12, 1988

Height: 6' 9"

Reach: 85"

Total fights: 35

Record: 34-0-1 (24 KOs)

Oleksandr Usyk record and bio

Nationality: Ukrainian

Date of birth: January 17, 1987

Height: 6' 3"

Reach: 78"

Total fights: 21

Record: 21-0 (17 KOs)

Fury vs. Usyk fight card
